summary: WE WERE SOLD THIS VEHICLE TO FLAT TOW BEHIND A MOTOR COACH. ON THE HIGHWAY THE CAR STARTS TO SHAKE DANGEROUSLY OUT OF CONTROL. A DEATH WOBBLE.  WE HAD TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP TO GET THE VEHICLE UNDER CONTROL. WE THOUGHT WE HAD A TIRE BLOW OUT. IT IS UNSAFE TO TOW AS WAS DICTATED IN MY MANUAL. THIS VEHICLE WAS SOLD UNDER FALSE PRETENSE AND NEEDS TO BE RECALLED. I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO PAY ANOTHER $600 TO TOW THIS VEHICLE SAFELY WHEN IT WAS SOLD TO ME AS A SAFE VEHICLE TO TOW
